document.full_text: the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. forces was not a joint operation with pakistan, the president of pakistan said in an opinion column published on monday.
document.title: pakistan's zardari: bin laden raid was not joint operation
lines_and_colors: the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. forces was not a joint operation with pakistan, the president of pakistan said in an opinion column published on monday.
